message: I have a great deal for you, Bob! I'm willing to sell this amazing product to you for $150.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate you coming down in price, Alice. I'm still not quite there. How about $125? I'm sure we can find a middle ground.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
